mapper.insert: insert into member(mId, pw, mName, phone, address, email, regDate) values(#{mId}, #{pw}, #{mName}, #{phone}, #{address}, #{email}, now())
mapper.select: select a.mid, a.pw, a.mName, a.phone, a.address, a.email, a.regDate, a.mLevel, b.currentPoint, b.updateDate FROM member a INNER JOIN point b ON a.mid=b.mid and a.mid=#{mId}

select m.mId, m.mName, m.mLevel, m.regDate, p.currentPoint from member m INNER JOIN point p ON m.mId = p.mId
order by mId asc LIMIT #{pageStart}, 10;
